ygData.subject: Re: The Light of the Flame!
ygData.msgSnippet: With his speedometer increasing by the seconds, Tucson Prime carries Nightshift and Perceptor swiftly toward the exit of the tunnel, as instructed by Perceptor

With his speedometer increasing by the seconds, Tucson Prime carries Nights=
hift and Perceptor swiftly toward the exit of the tunnel, as instructed by =
Perceptor and Rodimus.  As he does so he first replies to Rodimus.

"I copy=
 you Rodimus, I promise to protect Nightlight and I swear I will avenge the=
 wrong doing that Jhiaxus and Hydras have done to you.  But that time is no=
t now.  May Primus guide you safely Rodimus, I salute you.  Tucson Prime, e=
nding transmission.  Perceptor, Since I can't see, and elevations in temper=
ature are throwing off my thermal sensors, I'll need you to give me the dir=
ections verbally.  Night Shift, how are you holding out back there with Win=
dlord?"

Night Shift keeps Windlord secure and safe from further injury.

"=
Okay sir, He's stable.  Hey, I just got Legacy's transmission.  Quickstride=
's down here too.  He got lured in by Deepstryke and the other seekers."

T=
ucson Prime's temper was begining to be cut a bit short.  He was sick and t=
ired of Hydras's lackies trying to lure his comrades into dangerous situati=
ons.  Yet, he knew that he had the help of Perceptor who he was also helpin=
g at the time.  Getting mad would solve nothing, but attempting to turn an =
enemy into a comrade, would make a difference.  It wasn't for gaining the u=
pper hand, it was more for ensuring that those who wished for freedom, were=
 able to have it and lead a decent and content life.  It's what he wanted m=
ost of all for those who would have liked to have lived in a world where th=
ey could make their own choices.

" Don't worry Night Shift, averages even =
out after a while.  And I have a feeling this one will surely even out for =
us."

He keeps on his course and concentrates on getting everyone out safel=
y.  Yet he found he could also converse with his passengers and keep an ear=
 out on the road ahead.

" Perceptor, after this ordeal, I know you said th=
at the next time we meet we'll be enemies, and I do respect your choice but=
 I want you to know that wherever your choices lead you, I want you to know=
 that my doors are open if you wish to step into them."

Night Shift could =
also see the sacrifice Perceptor had made for his leader and the others.  H=
e also thought twice about the Predacon.

" He's right, No Predacon's ever =
shown compassion for anyone, and what you just did, if that's not compassio=
n I dunno what is.  Yeah, ya carry yourself like a baddie, but, deep down s=
omeplace, deep down, there's a decent bot just waitn' ta come out.  And we =
don't say that about every Predacon or Decepticon either.  And we could rea=
lly use an A class intel specialist like you at the Ark."

Tucson chuckles.=


"Now, don't force him if he doesn't want to. But the invitation is open i=
f he wants to take it or not. Remember, Autobots don't force others into th=
eir way of life, they give an individual the chance to chose where they wis=
h to be and respect their wishes."

Night Shift sighs.

"As ya wish sir."

=
Quickstride knew when to turn tail, and this time, he does just as his gut =
feelings tell him to do.  Turn around and bolt as fast as his hooves could =
take him.

"On second thought Legacy's right!  I'M OUTA HERE!"



--- In nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Who: R=
ODIMUS PRIME, CYCLONUS, SCOURGE, JHIAXUS, SCORPONOK, Tuscon,
> Nightshift, =
Darkhawk, Perceptor
> Location: Black Fortress - Tunnels beneath the Black =
Fortress
> 
> > " Uh, uh, I think Rodimus told ya to go back for a good rea=
son Sir. Maybe it's time, ya know? New era, new Prime? You're it now Tucson=
 Prime, you're gonna be our new hope for a better future. And you're alread=
y don' that. Ohh yeah, you're gonna be a legend, and I think Rodimus knows =
it."
> >
> > Tucson Prime pauses for a moment, and then understands what Ni=
ght Shift was telling him.
> >
> > " I just didn't think it would happen th=
is soon Night Shift. You're right. We'll all leave together and get everyon=
e back to the Ark."
> 
> As the Autobots, Maximals and Perceptor begin to m=
ake their way out
> Rodimus nodded, his armor once again that smooth black =
and polished
> finish of Dark Rodimus, the cold white flames majestically a=
cross his
> chest. However it was amber colored optics that looked up at Cy=
clonus
> and Jhiaxus as they come down the tunnels toward him.
> 
> "Yes, b=
rothers, comrades it is time to end this." Rodimus said, his
> voice soundi=
ng strained.
> 
> Rodimus turned as if he were about to fire his weapons at=
 the
> retreating Tuscon and Perceptor, but instead sent a spread of rocket=
s
> at the tunnel walls and ceiling!
> 
> Explosively the walls collapsed, =
bringing tons of rock down towards
> the floor, cutting off any chance of a=
ttack that Cyclonus and the
> others may had in Tuscon's direction!
> 
> Th=
e last sounds that can be heard from the inside is Cyclonus as he
> said, "=
Now, what is . . ." there is a pause and then Cyclonus' voice,
> ". . . RUN=
 FLEE NOW!" and then Rodimus' distinct laughter!
> 
> A message comes to Pe=
rceptor and Tuscon from Rodimus, "Protect
> Nightlight! I have broken my pr=
omise to her, but I think she'll know
> why."
> 
> Then the cave began to r=
umble as, on the other side of the newly
> fallen wall of stone and debris,=
 the explosive charge that Perceptor
> had left finished its count down! Th=
e debris rumbled and shook as if
> it were about to erupt with something, b=
ut then it finally fell
> silent.
> 
> Steam and the unique smell of sulfur=
 began to fill the air, venting
> from the other side of the fallen wall.
>=
 
> Meanwhile . . .
> 
> Who: LEGACY, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, Rat Trap, Quickst=
ride,
> Location: Black Fortress - Hallways
> 
> > In another part of the t=
unnel system, Quick Stride, who was full of determination to get at Deepstr=
yke and the other seekers, falls for the lure, as Rat Trap tries desperatel=
y to go after him.
> >
> > " Wait, I smell a rat, and it's not me! Don't fa=
ll for it Quickstride! IT'S A TRAP! UGHHH THAT STUPID HORSE!"
> 
> Legacy c=
ontinued firing at the shield, his cannon attempting to bring
> it down wit=
h a resonance burst!
> 
> Deepstryke on the other hand chuckled as he lured=
 Quickstride back to
> an area where the Black Fortress' autocannons were o=
perative, and then
> he stopped, as the cannons oriented themselves on Quic=
kstride.
> 
> "Ahh Maximal, and here is where your foray ends." Deepstryke =
said
> coldly as his own cannons come online. "It's a shame you fell for th=
is
> so easily." Deepstryke said as he gloated. "Fir . . . "
> 
> Even as h=
e spoke the walls and floor began to shift and rumble as
> somewhere below =
the Fortress, Perceptor's explosion went off! The
> lights and power to the=
 auto cannons and the shield that Deepstryke
> had in place, separating Qui=
ckstride from the others shut off,
> plunging them all into a sudden darkne=
ss!
> 
> "WHAT?!? NO!" Phobia said in surprise, although where she was exac=
tly
> in the darkness was difficult to make out.
> 
> A cannon blast lanced=
 out at Deepstryke, in this new darkness looking
> like lightning! Deepstry=
ke is knocked backwards as Legacy transmitted
> to Quickstride, "Come. It i=
s time to leave this place quickly."
> 
> Legacy's engines revved as he beg=
an to back out and work his way
> towards the exit, although he kept his ca=
non oriented in Deepstryke's
> direction should he have to defend himself f=
urther. His headlights
> came on, lighting up the tunnel ahead.
> 
> So far=
 Phobia and Blackrazor were no where to be seen, although noise
> from Deep=
stryke could be heard coming from somewhere in the darkness
> behind them.
=
> 
> (TAG)
